value:
You look capable of giving me a
decent challenge, and yet I cannot
fight you. How maddening.

I slough off the past as a snake does
his skin. I slink constantly forward, to
my next prey. That is all I need.

Soldiers, like weapons, turn dull from
disuse. Only by going to battle and
shedding blood can one stay sharp.

Some of these so-called "Heroes" are
clearly weaklings. You would do well
to let me cull the herd.

My blade has been sharpened...and it
craves flesh.

Your friend sent me here to impart a
message. While I'm here, why don't
you let me kill one of your Heroes?
Who will dare face me now?
Did you expect me to be grateful?

I have no name. But when people
whisper stories of my ghastly deeds,
they call me the Death Knight.

I have a talent for murder that
demands expression. How dare you
constrict me?$k$pKnow that my truest, deepest wish is
to engage you in a mortal duel...and,
in that duel, to die by your hand.$k$pYou are capable of ending my life,
are you not?$k$pI eagerly await that day. Meanwhile,
I will sharpen my scythe and slay any
weakling foolish enough to cross me.
Are you prepared to battle me?
The next time you touch me, you will die.
I wield a scythe forged by forbidden techniques...
I have detached from all... Even family...
